WorkItem.ClosedComment: Hunter in 2.2.25 will have this corrected
WorkItem.Description:
Corren's Chromium Coaster is showing as less of a boost to my hunter's DPS than the Mirror of Truth, when they are absolutely identical items.
Â 
They have the same 84 crit, the same on-crit effect, and aside from the name do the exact same thing, yet somehow it's showing Mirror of Truth as a boost to DPS - I believe something is wrong in the calculations, or the item stats for one of the two items.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Corren's Chromium Coaster (and other trinkets) calculations incorrect

Comments.Message: Look at the items. Does one have a special effect, and one not? Did you try refreshing that one's data?

They both have the exact same proc effect setup in the item listing, I checked that before submitting - its set to on PhysicalCrit, has the same chance, uptime, and internal cooldown. Everything about the items looks identical except for the names, yet it shows them different on DPS increase.

I took off the SpecialEffect and the Crit for both items and Chromium appropriately went to 0 dps (since it had no stats) then did the same to Mirror of Truth and somehow, magically, it was still giving 5.22 dps
Ah, apparently the hunter module is specially handling that trinket (as well as some others) instead of actually doing SpecialEffects (like it should be).
